quest.name: Fruit Savior
journal:
 Quest Sync
Qefiraz is rubbing the small of his back and smiling at you through the pain.
objectives: Deliver the crate of fruit to the designated location.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: You there. I take it by the hunger in your eyes that you're in search of work. As luck would have it, I'm in need of assistance and have the coin to make it worth your while.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: Usually I'd haul these goods ashore myself, but today my back doesn't seem amenable to the prospect. If you could help an old merchant out, I reckon we can both go to sleep today satisfied.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: Ah, very good, very good! I've marked on the map where the crates are to be delivered. Careful now─the fruits inside bruise easily!

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: Give me a shout once you're done, and we'll see about getting you paid.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the crate of fruit to the designated location before the time runs out.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have two minutes to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: Oi, you didn't drop the crate, did you? Don't go telling me your back is crying out in protest─I picked you because of your robust looks. Here, have another, but lift with your legs this time!

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: Apologies for foisting this task on you, but I reckon you're up to it. I've marked the location they're to be delivered on your map─godsspeed!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate of fruit rests snugly among the rest of the shipments. Report your success to Qefiraz.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You drop the crate, and exotic fruit spills across the ground. Qefiraz might be displeased, but you should report to him for further guidance.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: No crate in your hands, eh? I take it that means your task is done. Good job.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: That particular shipment was packed to the brim with this region's finest fruits. Owing to this region's insufferable heat, they're sweeter than any other I've ever tasted.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: I was meant to deliver them to a client of mine in Limsa Lominsa, but no sooner had I set sail than I received word that my goods were no longer needed. A damned shame, but now that they're resting under the shade, at least they won't go to waste.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: That's life, eh? Sometimes the wind is at your back, sometimes you're left floundering. And other times you're stuck in bed on a beautiful day because your back is having none of it.

dialogue.name: QEFIRAZ
dialogue.text: But I tend to find that fortune smiles upon those with patience, as they did today when I saw you strolling along the docks. Anyroad, here's your payment for a job well done. Till next we meet!
